document_data.name: Vampiric Touch
document_data.mainbody: '''''Vampiric touch''''' was a [[necromancy]] spell that absorbed the life force of a living creature to heal the caster.
document_data.Effects: If the caster managed to hit and establish contact with another creature, the spell started siphoning life from the target and healing the caster. The ability to perform this life drain continued active for up to one minute, as long as the caster kept concentrating.
document_data.Components: The spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[Somatic component|somatic]] components.
document_data.History: The spell was attributed to [[Netherese arcanist]] [[Gwynn]] in {{Yearlink|-804}} and was originally known as ''Gwynn's vampirism''.
